body:
I will be out of the office starting  02/09/2015 and will not return until
02/16/2015.

Dear Sender, Thank you for your email message.

I am currently on course from 09/02/2015 - 12/02/2015 and on leave
13/02/2015 - 15/02/2015.

Please leave your email or text at 92280897 and I will get back to you as
soon as I can.
